We need a short micro‑learning module on remote‑work security based on our internal policy RMT‑2024. It should be a quick 5‑minute lesson with an infographic and a 3‑question quiz. Please publish it to the LMS.

arguments.text:
Remote‑Work Security Policy (RMT‑2024)

1. Purpose
   Ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of company data when employees work remotely.
2. Scope
   Applies to all employees, contractors, and third‑party vendors accessing corporate resources from off‑site locations.
3. Definitions
   • Remote work – Performing job duties outside the corporate premises.
   • VPN – Virtual Private Network used to encrypt traffic.
4. Obligations
   • Use company‑approved VPN for all connections.
   • Enable multi‑factor authentication (MFA) on all devices.
   • Keep operating system and applications up‑to‑date.
   • Store work data on encrypted corporate devices only; no personal devices.
   • Report any suspected security incident within 24 hours.
5. Monitoring
   • IT may monitor network traffic for compliance.
6. Enforcement
   • Violations may result in disciplinary action up to termination.

sections.heading: Why Use a VPN?
sections.body: All remote connections must be made through the corporate VPN to keep traffic encrypted and protect company data.

sections.heading: Multi‑Factor Authentication (MFA)
sections.body: Enable MFA on every device to add an extra layer of security beyond passwords.
